name: Firework Shaper
description:
(if the controls don't work, click inside the game window and try again)

My entry into #whgj week 1 2017. The theme was "Happy New Year", so I created a fireworks show. To add a bit of interactivity, you can move a cursor around and draw shapes with X or Y to create different firework effects.

I definitely still had a few things on my TODO list after an hour, so it's missing some polish, but overall I'm happy with what I finished in 60 minutes.

This game was created with PICO-8, which I've been playing around with recently. The source code for this game is available here.
